feedback.TITLE QUALITY: The title, 'Neo-Victorian Steampunk Portrait Photography,' is descriptive but slightly weak on emotional impact. It adheres to the length requirement (5 words) and clearly conveys the output type ('Photography'). However, the structure is slightly inverted from the strict [Descriptor] + [Subject] + [Type] requirement, reading more like [Style] + [Subject] + [Type]. A minor refinement is suggested for maximum impact.
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: The template is highly structured and professional. The use of `[SUBJECT]` is unambiguous (8/8). The core style descriptors, focusing heavily on aesthetic elements like 'intricate gears and brass elements' and 'deep shadows,' provide excellent control (10/10). Technical specifications are strong (85mm, f/1.4, UHD) but could benefit from specifying a film stock or camera manufacturer (e.g., 'Hasselblad medium format') to achieve full points. Consistency with the title is perfect.
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: This is the weakest area of the package. Only 5 examples were provided, critically failing the requirement for 8-10 diverse examples (3/8). While the existing examples ('retired airship captain,' 'young clockwork inventor') demonstrate good thematic range, the submission needs expansion to include abstract concepts, setting variations, or non-character subjects (e.g., 'A complex mechanical heart,' or 'A group of inventors working late'). This lack of variety limits the demonstration of the prompt's full capability.
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: The commercial package is excellent. The niche is well-defined, addressing specific use cases like character design and book covers. The suggested price tier ($2.99) is appropriate for a highly specialized, high-quality portrait generator. The unique value proposition is clearly established through the blending of Neo-Victorian aesthetics with detailed photographic technicals.
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: The description starts with a compelling hook ('Capture the romantic grit...'). Use cases are clearly specified. However, the description fails to explicitly list the powerful technical features embedded in the prompt template. Stating 'Utilizes advanced photographic techniques' is vague; it should specify 'Features 85mm f/1.4 framing and volumetric lighting' to fully satisfy the technical listing requirement and increase buyer confidence.
